attributes.action: At the earliest opportunity he recommend to her majesty that Joanna Lumley should be  enobled as Lady Lumley and sit in her house of lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley, clearly cares for this country, is a stout defender of its democracy, has won cross party support for her work and would be an excellent addition to the House.
